item.title: Interface: AppMenu
item.description: plugin/lib .AppMenu The members of AppMenu should be the same as the options for the MenuItem in https://www.electronjs.org/docs/latest/api/menu-item except for the “submenu” (which is the AppMenu type) and “click” (which is not supported here, use the “url” field instead). Indexable ▪ [key: string]: any Any other members from Electron’s MenuItem. Properties submenu • Optional submenu: AppMenu [] The submenus of this menu Defined in plugin/lib.ts:72 url • Optional url: string
